titleStmt.title: Honey out of the rock, or, Gods method in giving the sweetest comforts in sharpest combates. Chiefly intended, as spirituall plunder for plundered beleevers.
titleStmt.author: Price, John, Citizen of London.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Francis Neile for Henry Overton in Popes-Head Alley,
